alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Dougherty; Early; Lee; Mitchell; Terrell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 9:49PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dougherty, northeastern Mitchell, south central Lee, Baker, eastern Calhoun, northeastern Early, south central Terrell Counties in southwestern Georgia and west central Worth Counties in south central Georgia through 1045 PM EST... At 949 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Leary to near Morgan to 7 miles southwest of Arlington. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newton, Morgan, Albany, Putney, Arlington, Baconton, Leary, East Albany, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Turner City, Walker, Douglasville, Centerville, Damascus, Iveys Mill, Flint, Radium Springs, Forrester, Lockett Crossing and South Albany. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Calhoun; Dougherty; Early; Lee; Mitchell; Terrell; Worth
